title: Account hacked and location moved?
body:
Happened to me Yesterday, (made this account to post) and was wondering if anything like this has happened to anyone else. Anyway long story short i was at work got home wanting to play league. 

Tried to log in when the game says "Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region."

 Now i'm in NA and have been since Season 4 (that's when i started) and I've never had anyone else log into my account. So instantly i think "maybe im banned? or someone hacked me? no problem ill just change my password and try to login with account name and new password in each reagion till i can find a match" 

Go to my email and i see 2 emails saying that i purchased $200 worth of RP which clearly wasn't me because i didn't even have access to my account. Now what really annoys me is that this was through paypal which i don't use on video games 

anyway i put in support tickets for riot (which i guess is what im supposed to do?) and have paypal investigating the purchases.

if anyone could be as kind to tell me if there is anything i missed or if they have had anything else happen to them like this and just wants to help another player out i'd greatly appreciate it.

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with account recovery and reperations!  I'm glad you've put in a ticket, but since you are posting from another account I can't check on your ticket status.  Regardless, we'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible!  In the meantime, go over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for some safety practices to get secured for League or anything else you have online.  Hang tight!

Okay i borrowed an account to be able to post 
Would it be of assistance if i gave you the Username or the in game summoner name?

No borrowing accounts please!  Account sharing is not something we can support, and one of the reasons of how an account can get compromised or transferred.  No further information is necessary, and sharing your username could be a liability against your account security.  Just make sure not to bump your ticket as it could drop it to the bottom, and it will be responded to as soon as possible.
Contact player support immediately via a ticket.
